title: Konstantinos Tasoulas - Wikipedia
snippet: Konstantinos Tasoulas (Greek: Κωνσταντίνος Τασούλας [konstaˈdinos taˈsulas]; born 17 July 1959) is a Greek politician and lawyer who has served as the president of the Hellenic Republic since 13 March 2025. He previously served as President of the Hellenic Parliament from ...

title: Konstantinos Tasoulas Becomes the New President of Greece - GreekReporter.com
snippet: Greece’s Parliament elected Konstantinos Tasoulas as the next President of the Republic on Wednesday. In the fourth round of voting, Tasoulas gained 160 votes in the 300-member chamber.

title: Presidential Election 2025 Greece
snippet: Konstantinos Tasoulas is elected President of Greece

title: President of Greece | Current Leader
snippet: Konstantinos Tasoulas, President of Greece Assumed office: 12 February 2025 Konstantinos Tasoulas was elected President of Greece in February 2025 after several rounds of parliamentary voting.

title: Salary, Income, Net Worth: Konstantinos Tasoulas - 2025 - Paywizard.org
snippet: Konstantinos Tasoulas is a Greek politician and lawyer who has served as the president of the Hellenic Republic since 13 March 2025. He previously served as President of the Hellenic Parliament from 2019 to 2025.
